DisconnectReason

enum DisconnectReason : Enum<ExternalUsbChannel.DisconnectReason>

Available disconnect reasons for externally connected readers.

Entries

REQUESTED
Link copied to clipboard
REQUESTED

Disconnect requested via Terminal.disconnectReader.

READER_DISCONNECTED
Link copied to clipboard
READER_DISCONNECTED

Reader unplugged from external connection.

STAND_DISCONNECTED
Link copied to clipboard
STAND_DISCONNECTED

External connection disconnected.

READER_RESET
Link copied to clipboard
READER_RESET

Reader firmware reported disconnect.

READ_ERROR
Link copied to clipboard
READ_ERROR

Error during read, SDK will disconnect.

WRITE_ERROR
Link copied to clipboard
WRITE_ERROR

Error during write, SDK will disconnect.
